item.title: No Irish Start-Ups Through To SeedCamp
item.description: I was disappointed to see that no Irish start-ups made it through to the initial 20 on SeedCamp. My gut tells me this is simply due to lack of applications. I only knew of one start-up here that applied. Did you? As the old ad goes “if you’re not in, you can’t win”. Maybe when they see the great outcome for the winners of the first one, we’ll have more youngfellas and youngwans getting up of their bums and giving it a go.
